title: Global Carbon Credit Trading Platform Market Analysis Report 2022 - Strategies Driving Net-Zero Goals to Boost ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global carbon credit trading platform market is expected to reach USD 200.6 billion by 2027, driven by the increasing need to curb global warming and achieve net-zero emissions. The market is dominated by the regulated carbon market segment due to mandatory national and international policies aimed at reducing greenhouse gas emissions. The utilities sector is the largest end-use segment, driven by high demand for electricity generation and related emissions.
